attributes.action: reveal to the taxpayer how much of the G BP151.2 billion given away in welfare payments last year, was given to non-UK citizens who have never before nor since contributed one single penny to the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The taxpayers of any country have a right (and in most countries (including some of our EU so called 'partners)  it is a legal requirement) to have their money which is taken away in taxes to be spent to their benefit.  Such money should not be handed to corrupt government departments - like the one headed by Gordon Brown - to be handed over as a bribe to 'vote for me' -  to any non-UK citizen who has never contributed to the UK national insurance payments system.  The taxpayers has a right to know how our elected representatives are using our money to purchase votes for the furtherance of their party political future.
